data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bortoni, Marco Aurelio, Penteado-Dias, Angelica Maria (2015): New species of Plesiocoelus van Achterberg and Mesocoelus Schulz (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) from Brazil. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 46: 61-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.46.6661, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.46.6661
